Note: For a variant in 8-line stanzas see 2846; for a very similar prayer in 6-line stanzas see 2838.
Subjects: prayers, by Christ and His Passion; Christ, wounds of; sins, deadly
_description: A prayer by the Seven Times Christ shed His Blood, linked as Remedies against the Deadly Sins — seven 6-line stanzas

CamStJohn237.First Lines:
Ihesu ffor þyn precius blodeþat thow schedest for owre
                    gode…
CamStJohn237.Last Lines:
…To loue Ihesu & holy ChyrcheAnd to Ihesu Crist me
                    take

Lam559.First Lines:
Ihesu for thi blod so swetethat swettis on olyuete of thi
                    facelette me nevir in wreth fallebut loue myn evyncristen
                    alle…
Lam559.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for thi woundis smerteand for thi blod that ran fro
                    thin harteand watir I menged to gedirmake stil in chariteand in
                    thi blisse thou bringe meand all cristen th
